name: cbvalivw
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| diffsw(s1, wal(s0, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| diffsw(s1, wal(s0, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

body.origin:
|- diffsw(s1, wal(s0, w0))
-| diffss(s1, s0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| diffss(s1, s0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

comment: Change bound variable. Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes. Part of Lemma 7 of [KalishMontague] p. 86. (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2017.)
